name: Create new players and add points in Pointagram from new rows in an Excel workbook
description:
This template periodically checks for new rows in a source Excel workbook and uses the retrieved information to create new players and to add points in Pointagram.

The template uses this [example workbook.](https://celonis-my.sharepoint.com/:x:/p/v_pukha_ext/Ea9lxX12owdJv6ujB_l_5GcBBVFXw9a4Q8FvR4vgNGZP8Q?e=TXfUhP) You should make a copy of it before configuring the template.

The template is scheduled to run every 15 minutes. You can change the schedule after you set up the template.
